QuestData.Title: Finish Them!
QuestData.Description: We've softened them up. Now it's time to finish them off!$b$bThat fortress must be cleansed of Alliance, and we've got nowhere to keep any prisoners.$b$b<The hint of a smile crosses Nazgrim's face.>$b$bYou know what to do, $n. The cowards will run if you give them the chance.$b$bSee that you don't!
